snippet: Justin Gatlin remained unbeaten this season by winning the 100 meters at the Golden Spike meet in Ostrava, Czech Republic, with a time of 9.86 seconds.
abstract: American sprinter Justin Gatlin wins 100 meters at Golden Spike meet in Czech Republic, retaining his undefeated record this season.
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin remained unbeaten this season by winning the 100 meters at the Golden Spike meet in Ostrava, Czech Republic, with a time of 9.86 seconds.
